attributes.action: make MPS claim only expenses which are wholly, exclusively and necessarily required.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPS have been allowed to claim expenses which are not usually reimbursable to the ordinary tax payer. MPs should only be able to claim the same expenses as we can. Expenses have to be wholly, exclusively and necessary for the business. Let HMRC decide which MPs expenses are reasonable, like they do with every individual, partnership and business in the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
